6.13. end_topic Macro

Interface

The general syntax is:

  !end_topic

See Understanding Macro Interfaces, if necessary.

Description

This macro marks the end of a topic.

Examples

Limitations & Future Directions

Hopefully, this macro will disappear real soon now.
